mapper.insert: insert into exc_supplement_info (id, operator_id,station_id,connector_id,equipment_id, inf_name, inf_ver, inf_type, original_time, is_need_supply, supply_time, supply_type, supply_result, supply_fail_reason, supply_times, memo1,memo2 )values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectorID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNeedSupply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyFailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select e1.connector_name as memo1, e2.operator_id as operator_id, e2.connector_id as connector_id, e2.inf_name as inf_name, e2.original_time as original_time,
e2.inf_type as inf_type, e2.is_need_supply as is_need_supply, e2.supply_time as supply_time, e2.equipment_id as equipment_id, e2.station_id as station_id
from exc_connector_info e1,exc_supplement_info e2 where e1.operator_id = e2.operator_id and e1.connector_id = e2.connector_id and e2.operator_id =#{operatorID} and e2.station_id =#{stationID}
and e2.inf_name =#{infName} and e2.original_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and e2.supply_times <= '3'

select * from exc_supplement_info where original_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and supply_times <= '3' union select * from exc_supplement_info where original_time >=#{startTime} and inf_name ='notification_bmsInfo' and supply_times <= '3'
mapper.update:
update exc_supplement_info
supply_result = #{supplyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_fail_reason = #{supplyFailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_times = #{supplyTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_type = #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_need_supply = #{isNeedSupply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_time = #{supplyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from exc_supplement_info where memo2 like '%电池%';
